name: The S-Rank Hunters Healing Life with Monsters
author: Team The Zeke
content: For decades, I was a mindless Chimera Hunter—a weapon forged and discarded. But after dying in the depths of a monster-infested gate, I woke up… human.Now, as Cheon Dowoon, I just wanted peace—a quiet life, a warm cup of tea, and zero demonic nonsense.Too bad fate had other plans.First, a lost hellhound dug up my garden. Then, a snarky shadow beast started napping on my porch. Worst of all? My old “acquaintances” keep showing up—some begging for help, others… for my head.Revenge? Survival?Please
